subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Willie Randolph chose to put on his diamond-embossed 1977 World Series ring Friday because, he said, 30 years after winning his first World Series, he has positive vibes again.
snippet: Willie Randolph chose to put on his diamond-embossed 1977 World Series ring Friday because, he said, 30 years after winning his first World Series, he has positive vibes again.
